channel.title: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server
channel.description: hi, this is my first time making a [562] server i've got it to work on my computer and its not my source :| but i want to get rid of all other messages that the pre owner had made so i can put new ones in it :D.... its those messages that pop up every like 2 mins :rolleyes: and also those when you loggin thay there are some different :D but yeah thxx :) :confused: :confused: if you only say what files the messages can be in it would help me alot..unless it wouldent be them but :D :D ;D ;D :cool:

item.title: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

jay vee dee:

thx:p

Thats ok

hey if ur using runeslay you may also want to change players.java just search it in your folder it will say something like “contact me @ *******.hotmail.com” or watever change it it watever you want

item.source: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server

item.title: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server
item.dc:creator: @jay_vee_dee jay vee dee
item.description:
@jay_vee_dee wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:3, topic:368617”][quote author=jay vee dee link=topic=464765.msg3398479#msg3398479 date=1289692601]
hi, this is my first time making a [562] server i’ve got it to work on my computer and its not my source but i want to get rid of all other messages that the pre owner had made so i can put new ones in it :D… its those messages that pop up every like 2 mins :rolleyes: and also those when you loggin thay there are some different but yeah thxx
if you only say what files the messages can be in it would help me alot…unless it wouldent be them but ;D ;D
[/quote]

Not very detailed post but full of emotions…
Anyway, If to change your welcome msg go to: ...\*serverfoldername*\data\scripts\authentication.py
Open it with text editor.

The rest would be in the folder called “src”, if u can’t change the other messages than hosting a 562 server isn’t for you. “…*serverfoldername*\data\scripts\authentication.py” is just a tricky one not many hosters solve that problem Its normaly a secret.[/quote]

thx:p

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server

item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“jay vee dee, post:1, topic:368617”]hi, this is my first time making a [562] server i’ve got it to work on my computer and its not my source but i want to get rid of all other messages that the pre owner had made so i can put new ones in it :D… its those messages that pop up every like 2 mins :rolleyes: and also those when you loggin thay there are some different but yeah thxx
if you only say what files the messages can be in it would help me alot…unless it wouldent be them but ;D ;D [/quote]

Not very detailed post but full of emotions…
Anyway, If to change your welcome msg go to: ...\*serverfoldername*\data\scripts\authentication.py
Open it with text editor.

The rest would be in the folder called “src”, if u can’t change the other messages than hosting a 562 server isn’t for you. “…*serverfoldername*\data\scripts\authentication.py” is just a tricky one not many hosters solve that problem Its normaly a secret.

item.title: How Do I Change Server Messages!? [562] server
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Just search what the message says in your source, see what comes up, and if nothing, use advanced search.

Unless you’re using windows XP, then I’m clueless on to how you’re going to search for it.

Read full topic
